description.value:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

You fire your weapon as you jump, using the kickback to go farther. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and discharge your firearm to add a +10-foot status bonus to the distance traveled. If you spend 2 actions for Black Powder Boost, you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} instead.

Special An ability that allows you to High Jump or Long Jump as a single action (like the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} skill feat) lets you use Black Powder Boost as a single action for those jumps as well.
